SideTabItem.value: Sub CallLO() Console.WriteLine("Calling LO") End Sub

Module Program
Sub CallLO() Dim objServiceManager As Object = CreateObject("com.sun.star.ServiceManager") Dim objDesktop As Object = objServiceManager.createInstance("com.sun.star.frame.Desktop")
Dim objSvc As Object = objServiceManager.createInstance("com.sun.star.sheet.FunctionAccess") Dim x As Double = 3.0 Dim arr1 As Double() = {x} Dim Result As Double = objSvc.callFunction("ERFC", arr1)
Dim arrEmpty As Object() = {} Dim objCalcDoc As Object = objDesktop.loadComponentFromURL("private:factory/scalc", "_blank", 0, arrEmpty) 'Set objCalcDoc = objDesktop.loadComponentFromURL("file:///C:/file.ods", "_blank", 0, Array())
Dim objSheet As Object = objCalcDoc.getSheets().getByIndex(0) objSheet.getCellByPosition(0, 0).SetString("Result: " + Result.ToString()) objSheet.getCellByPosition(0, 0).charWeight = 150 End Sub
Sub Main() CallLO() End Sub
End Module
